email.title: Merch Now Available!
email.text:
Head on over to the Union's website to buy DoCSoc-branded hoodies, T-shirts, and beanies. They will be available on the shop from 6pm on Wednesday 26th December, of course at rock-bottom prices thanks to our generous sponsors.
Available here: https://www.imperialcollegeunion.org/shop/club-society-project-products/computing-products
